title: Lump of royal jelly/ko
data:
| % [![Lump of royal jelly.png](/images/b/b4/Lump_of_royal_jelly.png)](/wiki/File:Lump_of_royal_jelly.png) |                                             |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                                     | lump of royal jelly                         |
| Base price                                                                                               | 15 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")            |
| Nutrition                                                                                                | [200](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")          |
| Turns to eat                                                                                             | 1                                           |
| Weight                                                                                                   | [2](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                  |
| Conduct                                                                                                  | [vegetarian](/wiki/Conduct#Vegan "Conduct") |

**로열 젤리 덩어리**는 보통 [벌집](/wiki/Beehive "Beehive")에서만 찾을수 있는 특별한 [comestible](/wiki/Comestible "Comestible")입니다. ([풍요의 뿔](/wiki/Horn_of_plenty "Horn of plenty")로도 생성될수 있음). 로열 젤리는 [vegetarian](/wiki/Vegetarian "Vegetarian") but not [vegan](/wiki/Vegan "Vegan").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 효과](#.ED.9A.A8.EA.B3.BC)
- [2 전략](#.EC.A0.84.EB.9E.B5)
- [3 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)
- [4 References](#References)

## 효과

축복받았거나 미저주인 로열 젤리 덩어리를 먹는것은 당신의 [힘](/wiki/Strength "Strength")을 1 올릴 것입니다. (이미 최대치가 아니라면)[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) 만약 저주받았다면, 그것은 당신의 힘을 1 낮출 것입니다.

당신의 다리가 [다쳤다면](/wiki/Wounded_legs "Wounded legs"), 그것은 치료될 것입니다.

당신의 [체력](/wiki/Hit_points "Hit points")이 0-20 만큼 상승합니다. (젤리가 저주받았다면 감소). 만약 이것이 당신의 최대 HP보다 당신의 HP를 더 높이게 된다면, 당신의 최대 HP를 1만큼 증가시킬 6.25%의 확률(16분의 1)이 있습니다.

*The following information pertains to an upcoming version ([NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.*

Applying royal jelly to objects will smear it on them. Currently the only object affected by this is the [egg](/wiki/Egg "Egg"). Cursed royal jelly will kill an egg; uncursed will rejuvenate it; and blessed will make the egg recognize you as its parent if it hatches in your inventory. This only works on monster eggs. Additionally, using royal jelly of any beatitude on a killer bee egg will turn it into a queen bee egg.

## 전략

Royal jelly is a popular comestible to store for the [ascension run](/wiki/Ascension_run "Ascension run"), as it has a very good [nutrition-to-weight ratio](/wiki/Nutrition/Weight "Nutrition/Weight") and can be eaten in one turn, both of which can be crucial concerns in the late game.

## Encyclopedia entry

"'Royal Jelly,'" he read aloud, "'must be a substance of  
tremendous nourishing power, for on this diet alone, the  
honey-bee larva increases in weight fifteen hundred times in  
five days!'"  
  
"How much?"  
  
"Fifteen hundred times, Mabel. And you know what that means  
if you put it in terms of a human being? It means," he said,  
lowering his voice, leaning forward, fixing her with those  
small pale eyes, "it means that in five days a baby weighing  
seven and a half pounds to start off with would increase in  
weight to five tons!"

\[ Royal Jelly, by Roald Dahl ]

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [eat.c in NetHack 3.4.3, line 1692](/wiki/Source:NetHack_3.4.3/eat.c#line1692 "Source:NetHack 3.4.3/eat.c")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Lump of royal jelly/ko

From NetHackWiki
< Lump of royal jelly
Jump to navigation Jump to search
%
Name lump of royal jelly
Base price 15 zm
Nutrition 200
Turns to eat 1
Weight 2
Conduct vegetarian

로열 젤리 덩어리는 보통 벌집에서만 찾을수 있는 특별한 comestible입니다. (풍요의 뿔로도 생성될수 있음). 로열 젤리는 vegetarian but not vegan.

Contents

  • 1 효과
  • 2 전략
  • 3 Encyclopedia entry
  • 4 References

효과

축복받았거나 미저주인 로열 젤리 덩어리를 먹는것은 당신의 힘을 1 올릴 것입니다. (이미 최대치가 아니라면)[1] 만약 저주받았다면, 그것은 당신의 힘을 1 낮출 것입니다.

당신의 다리가 다쳤다면, 그것은 치료될 것입니다.

당신의 체력이 0-20 만큼 상승합니다. (젤리가 저주받았다면 감소). 만약 이것이 당신의 최대 HP보다 당신의 HP를 더 높이게 된다면, 당신의 최대 HP를 1만큼 증가시킬 6.25%의 확률(16분의 1)이 있습니다.

The following information pertains to an upcoming version (NetHack 3.7.0). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.

Applying royal jelly to objects will smear it on them. Currently the only object affected by this is the egg. Cursed royal jelly will kill an egg; uncursed will rejuvenate it; and blessed will make the egg recognize you as its parent if it hatches in your inventory. This only works on monster eggs. Additionally, using royal jelly of any beatitude on a killer bee egg will turn it into a queen bee egg.

전략

Royal jelly is a popular comestible to store for the ascension run, as it has a very good nutrition-to-weight ratio and can be eaten in one turn, both of which can be crucial concerns in the late game.

Encyclopedia entry

"'Royal Jelly,'" he read aloud, "'must be a substance of
tremendous nourishing power, for on this diet alone, the
honey-bee larva increases in weight fifteen hundred times in
five days!'"

"How much?"

"Fifteen hundred times, Mabel. And you know what that means
if you put it in terms of a human being? It means," he said,
lowering his voice, leaning forward, fixing her with those
small pale eyes, "it means that in five days a baby weighing
seven and a half pounds to start off with would increase in
weight to five tons!"

[ Royal Jelly, by Roald Dahl ]


References

  1. ↑ eat.c in NetHack 3.4.3, line 1692

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.
